Exenye Scripts Repository
A collection of professional-grade ReaScript tools for REAPER, focusing on intuitive UI design and enhanced workflow efficiency.
Author: Exenye (Wieland Müller) Contact: wieland@exenye.com Support: https://ko-fi.com/exenye
Categories: - General: Workflow and project management tools - Item: Media item manipulation and organization - Region: Region and marker management - Tools: Advanced UI-based tools (require ReaImGui)
Most scripts are free to use, modify and distribute. Tools category contains copyrighted professional tools.
Requirements for UI Tools: - REAPER v6.0 or higher - ReaImGui extension - SWS/S&M Extensions (for some features)
Installation: 1. Install ReaImGui through ReaPack 2. Import this repository URL in ReaPack 3. Browse and install desired scripts
